sentences.en: A man either actively resists or passively resists.
sentences.cn: 男人对改变的反应,不是主动抗拒就是被动抗拒.

sentences.en: Designing is better than passively waiting for free market adjustment.
sentences.cn: 设计经济比被动的等待市场调节要好许多.

sentences.en: GW: You dont take a management job passively.
sentences.cn: 温伯格: 你并不是被动的承担了这份管理工作.

sentences.en: In fact, not only you can observe the requests passively, but you can also modify and resend them.
sentences.cn: 事实上，你不仅可以被动的做为这些请求的看客，还能主动出击修改和重新发送它们

sentences.en: In no case will they look on passively.
sentences.cn: 他们决不会在一边看热闹.

sentences.en: Level 1 - Passively increases Kardel's range by 55.
sentences.cn: 一级 - 被动地增加狙击手的步枪55的射程.

sentences.en: Level 2 - Passively increases Kardel's range by 110.
sentences.cn: 二级 - 被动地增加狙击手的步枪110的射程.

sentences.en: Level 3 - Passively increases Kardel's range by 165.
sentences.cn: 三级 - 被动地增加狙击手的步枪165的射程.

sentences.en: Level 4 - Passively increases Kardel's range by 220.
sentences.cn: 四级 - 被动地增加狙击手的步枪220的射程.

sentences.en: Mainly used evaporate passively to improve the thermal environment of the tents.
sentences.cn: 利用水分蒸发吸收大量汽化潜热的特性来改善帐篷的热环境.

sentences.en: No matter what caused the problems, we have no reason to passively accept them.
sentences.cn: 不管它产生的原因是什么样的，我们都没有理由去被动地接受。

sentences.en: Passively enhances the range of Kardel 39 ; s rifle.
sentences.cn: 被静天增添 狙击手 的步枪的射程.

sentences.en: People do not merely passively respond to the world.
sentences.cn: 人们不只是被动地对外部世界做出反应.

sentences.en: That is to say, while the man lies passively on his back, the woman straddles him and then lowers herself on his erect penis.
sentences.cn: 更确切地说，当男方仰卧、于被动状态时，女方跨骑在他上方，然后降低身子靠近他勃起的阴茎。

sentences.en: They served him passively and if obedience consisted in disappearing, they disappeared.
sentences.cn: 她们被动地服侍着他,如果为了服从,应当退避, 她们便退避.

sentences.en: They were at first grudgingly and later passively accepted.
sentences.cn: 他们起先是不情愿地,后来是消极地接受了.

sentences.en: We do not want to passively wait for others'help.
sentences.cn: 我们不要被动地等待别人的帮助.

sentences.en: Writing is everywhere, and suburban, passively waiting to be read.
sentences.cn: 书写遍布城乡, 被动地等待阅读.

words.tran_cn: 被动的，消极的；被动语态的
被动性；被动结构；无抵抗
